name: peerprep

scripts.dev:docker: docker compose up api-gateway user-service matching-service collab-service question-service communication-service redis-collab-service redis-matching-service pg-question-service --build
scripts.dev:microservices: docker compose up user-service matching-service collab-service question-service redis-collab-service redis-matching-service pg-question-service --build
scripts.dev:with-db: concurrently "npm run dev:docker" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run localdb"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:user-service
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../matching-service && npm install && cd ../collab-service && npm install && cd ../question-service && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../user-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../matching-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../collab-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../question-service && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules

scripts.stop:docker: docker compose down && docker compose --profile localdb down
scripts.logs:question: docker compose logs -f question-service
